name: Alexander Karelas's Homepage
body:
### Work
I program for various companies in Perl, MySQL, JavaScript and also a small bit of HTML & CSS.

### Personal traits
I've been coding in Perl for 13 years.

### Personal projects
In my spare time, I like to work on my own projects. PerlModules.net, KJabberd, XML::MyXML and I have a couple more that have not been released yet. I have begun to use AngularJS a lot.

### PerlModules.net
[PerlModules.net](https://www.perlmodules.net/) is a site that lets Perl programmers create their own RSS feeds that track new versions in their favourite Perl modules.

### KJabberd
[KJabberd](https://github.com/akarelas/KJabberd) is a simple Jabber server (written in Perl), especially designed to be integrated with websites. It's under development, but functional already. [Watch a video demo of KJabberd in action](http://files.karjala.org/videos/jabber.ogv).

### XML::MyXML
[XML::MyXML](https://metacpan.org/module/XML::MyXML) is a very easy-to-use Perl module, for parsing and creating XML documents.

### Favourite Perl Modules
[Mojolicious](http://mojolicio.us/), [Moo](https://metacpan.org/pod/Moo), [AnyEvent](https://metacpan.org/pod/AnyEvent)

### Favourite JavaScript Libraries
[AngularJS](http://angularjs.org/), [Moment.js](http://momentjs.com/), [Lo-Dash](http://lodash.com/)

### Bugs I've found and/or fixed
Here's a [list of bugs](/bugs.html) in other projects that I've found and/or provided a fix for since 2013.
